articles.title: Miami Dolphins' Xavien Howard arrested for domestic battery in Florida: reports
articles.description: Miami Dolphins star Xavien Howard was arrested on a domestic battery charge in Florida on Sunday, according to multiple reports.
articles.content:
Miami Dolphins star Xavien Howard was arrested on a domestic battery charge in Florida on Sunday, according to multiple reports.

articles.title: 5 women in New Jersey welcome 'miracle' babies after suffering with infertility issues
articles.description: “We tried to help each other find the silver lining and buoyed each other’s spirits when things didn’t go according to plan," one of the women said.
articles.content:
A group of five women in New Jersey who were dealing with infertility issues say they’re now bonded for life after becoming mothers within three months of each other.
The women – Micki Berg, Amie Thomas, Kristin Matty, Kristen Heller and Celeste Zazzali – ha… [+3014 chars]

articles.author: Robert Gearty
articles.title: Alabama woman rescued after 'citizen' sees her being kidnapped by stranger: police
articles.description: Alabama police said a call reporting a kidnapping in progress likely saved a woman from being killed by a man she did not know.
articles.content:
A call to police reporting a kidnapping in progress likely saved a woman from being abducted and possibly killed by a strange man, authorities in Alabama said.
Police in Brookside said they received a call Sunday from a “citizen” when they saw a strange inte… [+1885 chars]

articles.author: Joshua Nelson
articles.title: New York City civic leader points finger at Bill de Blasio for NYC homeless crisis
articles.description: Central Park South Civic Association President Mike Fischer said on Monday New York City’s homeless crisis needs serious attention while Mayor Bill de Blasio is blaming President Trump.
articles.content:
A New York City civic leader said Monday Mayor Bill de Blasio should do his job and address the city's homeless crisis instead of blaming President Trump.

articles.title: Why Imus Was Both Praised and Pummeled

articles.description: The man accused of stabbing five people at a rabbi’s home during a Hanukkah celebration this past weekend is being investigated over whether he played a role in a separate knife attack that happened in an adjacent town last month, reports say.

articles.title: Dems rush to blame Trump for anti-Semitic violence
articles.description: Several on the left jumped to point fingers at President Trump within hours of the Monsey attack -- inviting accusations that Democrats are distracting from anti-Semitism in their own ranks.
articles.content: Saturday's stabbing during a Hanukkah celebration at a rabbi's home in Monsey, N.Y., the latest in a spate of anti-Jewish violence in the region, drew bipartisan condemnation. But the attack also became a political football in a matter of hours, with several … [+5745 chars]

articles.title: Tourist recovers ashes of late son after remorseful thief directs her to urn
articles.description: Kinga Bednarz of Sweden was vacationing with her family in Paralimni, Cyprus, when the remains were stolen.
articles.content:
